mapper.select: SELECT A.CONTENT_NO , A.CONTENT_TITLE , A.CONTENT_STATUS_YN , REPLACE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CONTENT_START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd')), '/', '-') AS CONTENT_START_DATE , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_LIKE B WHERE A.CONTENT_NO = B.CONTENT_NO AND B.LIKE_YN = 'Y' ) AS CONTENT_LIKE FROM TBL_CONTENT A

SELECT A.CONTENT_NO , A.CONTENT_TITLE , CONCAT('20', REPLACE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CONTENT_START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd')), '/', '-')) AS CONTENT_START_DATE , A.CONTENT_COMMENT , A.CONTENT_DIRECTOR , A.CONTENT_ACTORS , A.CONTENT_GRADE , A.CONTENT_TYPE , A.CONTENT_STATUS_YN , (SELECT B.CONTENT_ATTACHMENT_SAVE_PATH FROM TBL_CONTENT_ATTACHMENT B WHERE B.CONTENT_NO = #{ contentNo } AND B.CONTENT_ATTACHMENT_CATEGORY = 'basic') AS BASIC_ATTACHMENT_SAVE_PATH , (SELECT B.CONTENT_ATTACHMENT_SAVE_PATH FROM TBL_CONTENT_ATTACHMENT B WHERE B.CONTENT_NO = #{ contentNo } AND B.CONTENT_ATTACHMENT_CATEGORY = 'banner') AS BANNER_ATTACHMENT_SAVE_PATH FROM TBL_CONTENT A WHERE A.CONTENT_NO = #{ contentNo }
mapper.update:
UPDATE TBL_CONTENT A SET
A.CONTENT_STATUS_YN = 'N'
A.CONTENT_STATUS_YN = 'Y'
WHERE A.CONTENT_NO = #{ contentNo }
